q: Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer plans to extend a management shake-up aimed at adding senior product executives with an engineering background, two people with knowledge of the decision said," Dina Bass reports for Bloomberg. Changes may be announced this month, said one of the people, who declined to be named because the plans are private, Bass reports. "Last month, Steve Ballmer pushed out server division president and 23- year company veteran Bob Muglia, saying the company needed new leadership that could focus on areas such as cloud software."
